rows.label: qst202408_msg0001
rows.name:
Where has the Kountess gone?!
Please find her quickly!

rows.label: qst202408_msg0002
rows.name:
Use your Merc Group, your informants,
whatever you can to find her!

rows.label: qst202408_msg0101
rows.name: Do you know where the Kountess is yet?

rows.label: qst202408_msg0102
rows.name:
Perhaps we should go
look for her as well...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202408_msg0202
rows.name:
Hurry! We must rescue the
Kountess as soon as possible!
